title.rendered: Middlesex Bar Stool with Optional Upholstery

content.rendered:
The Middlesex Bar Stool is designed and manufactured by hand in our European Studio.

Part of our Premier range the Middlesex is fully customisable in a wide choice of RAL Finishes, Wood Stains and upholstery options. You can truly customise the Middlesex to suit your style, taste and requirements.

The Middlesex can be finished in a veneer seat and backrest, veneer backrest with upholstered seat, fully upholstered seat and backrest or on-set backrest (visible ply edge) with fully upholstered seat.

This is a commercial grade chair of the highest quality.

Available in any of our standard Faux Leather colours and standard wood stains included in the price, see images for more options. RAL Colours are an extra charge with a set up fee of £60.00 for orders under a quantity of 10 items in the same RAL Colour.

We work closely with a number of fabric & faux leather mills as well as leather dealers so you can customise your chair to suit you, if our standard Faux Leather colours are not to your taste.

– Click here to browse Sunbury Design’s Fabric, Faux Leather and Real Leather ranges.

– Click here to browse Panaz’s Fabric, Faux Leather and Real Leather ranges.

– Click here to browse Crest JMT Leather’s range of leathers to suit all budgets!

The lead time is approximately 5-6 weeks and this item comes with a 2 year warranty.

We do not charge to upholster your chair in custom fabrics, fauxs or leathers, we only charge you what the material costs us, plus a small handling fee; which is included in the total price. If you prefer, you can purchase the material yourself and arrange for it to be delivered to our warehouse.
